sentences.sContent: He was critical of the people, disparaging of their crude manners.
sentences.sCn: 他批评那些人，贬低他们粗鲁的举止。

remMethod.val: 来自disparage(v. 蔑视， 贬低)， dis(不) + par(平等) + age → 不平等看人 → 贬低的

words.tran: 以轻视的态度，蔑视地；以贬抑的口吻

trans.tranOther: criticizing someone or something, and showing that you do not think they are very good or important
